title: Cable/WiFi access and USB charging stations

Apartments, a place where resort-inspired living and boundless comfort blend together to create an unforgettable experience.', 'Boasting a desirable location and a long list of gorgeous amenities, our apartments in Parker, CO, show you the true meaning of a luxury community.', 'Come visit us and bring your pets along,', 'Our panoramic views extend to the inside of our apartments for rent in Parker, CO, too.', 'You’ll be able to revel in the natural beauty of Mount Evans, Rocky Mountain Front Range, and Pike’s Peak.', 'Picture all of this, along with a premier location across the street from Crown Point commercial district and a 10-minute drive away from Denver, and you’ve just painted the perfect image of your new dream home.', 'All that’s left now is to see it in person, so schedule a tour of our Parker apartments today!', 'Features:', "Private, spacious patios and decks*, Designer kitchens with granite countertops and Whirlpool® stainless steel appliances, Rustic hardwood-style plank flooring and Berber-style carpeting, Double sinks and frameless glass showers with subway tiling*, Open, peninsula or island kitchen options, Built-in desks and storage*, Under-mount kitchen and bathroom sinks, Panoramic views of Mount Evans, Pike's Peak and the Rocky Mountain Front Range, Cable/WiFi access and USB charging stations, Modern ceiling fans with integrated light, Large walk-in closets with built-in shelving (featured in select homes), Euro-style cabinetry with upgraded hardware and open shelving, Full-size, front-load Whirlpool washers and dryers in unit, Custom gear bench at entry*, Modern lighting and designer plumbing fixtures", '*In select units', 'Community Amenities:', "1 mile away from Parker Adventist Hospital, Community courtyards with gourmet grills and fireside dining, 1.5-mile, on-site mountain bike and hiking trail that connects to Cherry Creek Trail, Community lounge with WiFi, fireplaces and shuffleboard, Entertaining bar with a kegerator and TVs, 2 miles to the Lightrail station connecting to downtown Denver and Denver International Airport (DIA), Community gardens and greenhouse with raised planting beds, 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness center and lounge, featuring a dedicated yoga studio, TRX equipment and WELLBEATS Virtual Fitness, 10 minutes driving to the Denver Tech Center, 20 minutes to downtown Denver and 30 minutes to DIA, Pull-in pet, bike and vehicle wash station, Across the street from Crown Point commercial district, with Costco, Boondock's Family Fun Center, Lifetime Fitness and Children's Learning Adventure, Outdoor bouldering rock, Resort-style pool, spa and lazy river, with private poolside cabanas, outdoor kitchen and large fire pits, 7 miles from Reuter-Hess Reservoir, which the town has planned to build out for fishing, hiking and non-motorized boating, Across the street from King Soopers Marketplace, featuring clothing and home goods departments, an expansive prepared foods section and dining area, 1.5 miles from Cherry Creek Trail, with direct access to Cherry Creek State Park", 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '3x the rent', 'Interested in more
